emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 cloves of garlic' is best matched with 'garlic, raw' because it is the least processed form of garlic available in the database, aligning with the rule to choose the least processed option when no processing is specified for the ingredient.
The ingredient '1 tablespoon olive oil' is an exact match for 'olive oil' in the database. This aligns with the rule to prioritize exact matches when available.

The ingredient '1 onion' is best matched with 'onion, raw' because it is the least processed form of onion available in the database, aligning with the rule to choose the least processed option when no processing is specified for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 dl vegetable broth' is best matched with 'bouillon, chicken, prepared' as it is the most appropriate broader category for a vegetable broth, given the available options. While not an exact match, it represents a prepared broth, which is the closest in processing and use. It is also the option with the highest emission factor among the prepared broths, following the tie-breaker rule.

The ingredient '1 can of chopped tomatoes' is an exact match for 'tomato, peeled, canned' in the database. This aligns with the rule to prioritize exact matches and consider the processing level (canned).
The ingredient 'Black pepper' is an exact match for 'pepper, black' in the database. This aligns with the rule to prioritize exact matches when available.

The ingredient '1 Squash' is an exact match for 'squash, raw' in the database. This aligns with the rule to prioritize exact matches and choose the least processed option when no processing is specified.
The ingredient '1 can of black beans' is an exact match for 'black beans' in the database. This aligns with the rule to prioritize exact matches and consider the processing level (canned).
The ingredient '1 can of kidney beans' is an exact match for 'kidney beans' in the database. This aligns with the rule to prioritize exact matches and consider the processing level (canned).

The ingredient '300 g of corn' is best matched with 'corn cob' as it represents the least processed form of corn available in the database, aligning with the rule to choose the least processed option when no processing is specified for the ingredient.

The ingredient '8 Tortilla's pancakes' is best matched with 'tortilla bread, wheat' as it is the closest available option for tortillas, which are a type of pancake/flatbread. This aligns with the rule to use a broader category if an exact match is not available.

The ingredient '150 g cheddar cheese' does not have an exact match in the database. Among the available options, 'blue cheese' is the most appropriate broader category for a type of cheese, and it has the highest emission factor among the cheese options, aligning with the tie-breaker rule.

The ingredient '1 handful of fresh coriander' does not have an exact match in the database. Among the available options, 'parsley, raw' and 'dill, raw' are both raw herbs with similar processing levels. Following the tie-breaker rule, both have the same emission factor, so 'parsley, raw' is chosen as a representative raw herb.

The ingredient '1 tablespoon butter' is best matched with 'butter, salt added' as it is the most direct and least processed form of butter available in the database, aligning with the rule to choose the least processed option when no processing is specified for the ingredient.
